{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=XR700 |revision=-100NAS
(Nighthawk Pro Gaming) |series=AD7200 |asin=B07GZYSJDZ |est_release_date=09/29/2016 |fcc_date=09/23/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316200339,PPD-QCA9008-SBD1,PY317400405 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL-514 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML04G200TF100 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP+ |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1 |wi2_module_if=M.2 (1216) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9500 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=ad |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=QCA8337N |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=6 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 2-port USB 3.0 PCIe Controller;ASMedia;ASM1024A;;1; ,,, 1x2 PCIe Packet Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, WiGig, VHT160, 256QAM, DFS, LACP, SFP+ (10GbE), |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;;DumaOS; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ad |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=B0:B9:8A |oui_eth=B0:B9:8A }}
:• '''4620''' Mbps - 1-stream 802.11ad device (MCS12/16-QAM (3/4)), :• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''7200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk Pro Gaming Router}} :''802.11ac Quad-Stream Wave2 Wi-Fi plus 802.11ad'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/npg/xr700/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=XR700}} This XR700 is assumed to be internally identical to the [[Netgear R9000]] :so most details are copied from there. {{see also|Netgear R9000|Netgear|Annapurna Labs}} ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[Netgear R9000]] - AD7200 *[[Netgear R8900]] - AD7000 *[[Netgear XR700]] - AD7200 *[[Netgear XR500]] - AC2600 *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/netgear-nighthawk-xr700-gaming-router-review/''Netgear Nighthawk XR700 Review'' on '''4GLTEmall'''] __NOTOC__
